H0.text: What magazine was started by Hugh Hefner. Esquire

H1.text: What magazine was started by Hugh Hefner. Penthouse

H2.text: What magazine was started by Hugh Hefner. Maxim

H3.text: What magazine was started by Hugh Hefner. PlayBoy

A4.text: Playboy was founded in Chicago in 1953 by Hugh Hefner and his associates, funded in part by a $1,000 loan from Hefner's mother.

A5.text: The first issue of Playboy was published in December 1953.
